类 Board

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Board

        public Board(char[][] map,
             Mana mana,
             double initial_tower_firing_speed,
             double initial_tower_range,
             double initial_tower_damage,
             double tower_cost,
             Wavemangement wavemangement,
             GameSet set,
             java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,javax.sound.sampled.Clip> sound)
        Constructs a game board with the provided configuration.
        参数:
        map - The 2D grid representing the game map.
        mana - The mana resource for the game.
        initial_tower_firing_speed - The initial firing speed of towers.
        initial_tower_range - The initial range of towers.
        initial_tower_damage - The initial damage dealt by towers.
        tower_cost - The cost of building towers.
        wavemangement - The wave management system.
        set - The game set configuration.
        sound - A collection of sound clips used in the game.

    • 方法详细资料

      • pathtype

        public java.lang.String pathtype(char[][] path,
                                 int i,
                                 int j)
        Determines the type of path under the specified coordinate in a 2D grid.
        参数:
        path - The 2D grid of characters representing the path.
        i - The row index of the coordinate.
        j - The column index of the coordinate.
        返回:
        A string representing the type of path, such as "path0" or "path1_clockwise_90".

      • creatboard

        public void creatboard()
        Initializes and creates the game map by processing the provided map data. This method populates the game board with grass, shrubs, paths. based on the configuration defined in the provided 2D grid (map).

      • containsgrass

        public Grass containsgrass(int mouseX,
                           int mouseY)
        Determines whether the mouse cursor is positioned over a grass area, which allows for the operation of creating a tower on that grass area.
        参数:
        mouseX - The x-coordinate of the mouse cursor.
        mouseY - The y-coordinate of the mouse cursor.
        返回:
        The Grass object if the mouse is over a grass area; otherwise, null.

      • containtower

        public void containtower(int mouseX,
                         int mouseY)
        Determines if the mouse cursor is positioned over a tower, allowing for the operation of updating a tower. If the mouse is over a tower, the selected tower is added to the list of selected towers.
        参数:
        mouseX - The x-coordinate of the mouse cursor.
        mouseY - The y-coordinate of the mouse cursor.

      • enablebuild

        public void enablebuild()
        Determine if the operation to create a tower has been executed

      • enablespeedlevelup

        public void enablespeedlevelup()
        Determine if the operation to update tower speed has been executed

      • enableRangelevelup

        public void enableRangelevelup()
        Determine if the operation to update tower range has been executed

      • enableDamagelevelup

        public void enableDamagelevelup()
        Determine if the operation to update tower damage has been executed

      • operate

        public void operate(int mouseX,
                    int mouseY)
        Perform operations such as building and upgrading towers based on mouse input.
        参数:
        mouseX - The x-coordinate of the mouse pointer.
        mouseY - The y-coordinate of the mouse pointer.

      • getShrubs

        public java.util.ArrayList<Shrub> getShrubs()
        Get the list of shrubs on the board.
        返回:
        An ArrayList of Shrub objects.

      • getGrass

        public java.util.ArrayList<Grass> getGrass()
        Get the list of grass on the board.
        返回:
        An ArrayList of Grass objects.

      • getPath

        public java.util.ArrayList<Path> getPath()
        Get the list of paths on the board.
        返回:
        An ArrayList of Path objects.

      • getWizard

        public Wizard getWizard()
        Get the wizard character on the board.
        返回:
        The Wizard object.

      • getselectedTowers

        public java.util.ArrayList<Tower> getselectedTowers()
        Get the list of selected towers for updates.
        返回:
        An ArrayList of Tower objects.

      • getTowers

        public java.util.ArrayList<Tower> getTowers()
        Get the list of towers on the board.
        返回:
        An ArrayList of Tower objects.

      • getbuildenable

        public boolean getbuildenable()
        Check if the operation to build towers is enabled.
        返回:
        true if tower building is enabled, false otherwise.

      • getspeedlevelupenable

        public boolean getspeedlevelupenable()
        Check if the operation to upgrade tower speed is enabled.
        返回:
        true if tower speed upgrading is enabled, false otherwise.

      • getRangelevelupenable

        public boolean getRangelevelupenable()
        Check if the operation to upgrade tower range is enabled.
        返回:
        true if tower range upgrading is enabled, false otherwise.

      • getDamagelevelupenable

        public boolean getDamagelevelupenable()
        Check if the operation to upgrade tower damage is enabled.
        返回:
        true if tower damage upgrading is enabled, false otherwise.
